title: Block full screen display permanently
content:
How to block the full screen function permanently at the same time that all menus are hidden, invisible, when you press the full screen button so that the video one gives a larger image without giving full screen. I have previously found a firefox program that could do that, but unfortunately I got it deleted.

Want to use the solution on a Win 10 PC, desktop PC and a screen of 1.5 m, i.e. 2 screens in one.
creator: dj54dan

title: blockpg-dock.safezone.mcafee... comes up, stops webpages from loading
content: ...where is McAfee hiding after I have uninstalled it on my 2021 M1 Mac Air?
creator: lcdebaca52

title: Sync all of a sudden have forgotten almost everything.
content:
I have used Firefox with sync since sync were released. Today (25th dec), all of a sudden hundreds of saved passwords are gone, just 9 out of at least 200.

I have changed the password for my account and logged in. Tried to logout and login again but just 9 passwords is found, extremely frustrating!

Anyone got a clue what has happened?

Peter, Sweden
creator: info10512

title: lost all my password
content: im at a loss, im not stupid but it seems firefox managed to delete all my logins and passwords. Isnt that information backuped in the cloud over ff sync? I cant find my logins at my other computers or on my profile
creator: velt

title: Firefox ESR does not run on 10.11.6
content: I'm trying to run Firefox ESR on on a Mac with OS 10.11.6. This page (https://support.mozilla.org/en-US/kb/firefox-mac-osx-users-esr) seems to indicate that Firefox ESR should work on a Mac with 10.11.6, but my computer says that Firefox ESR is not able to run on my Mac with 10.11.6. Any suggestions for how I can get Firefox to run on this older computer?
creator: johnwilliamschmidt

Le envio imagen de la ventana que aparece. Espero contestación. Gracias por todo y un saludo.

title: How do I disable the mozilla.com news popups?
content: How do I disable the mozilla.com news popups? I keep getting annoying news popups with Mozilla.com written at the top of the popup. Todays was USAToday. I did not request this and I want it gone.
creator: jefrdno

title: After update 121 all logins are gone
content:
Hi everyone,

so I just started firefox on windows 10 and updated it to version 121 and after that all my saved passwords are gone. Completly. Tried to restore them over my ios firefox but because of the sync feature it had already replaced the saved passwords there too. What is odd, that I am still logged in on couple of websits but the login data for them is nowhere to be found... Ofc I don't have any backup so I am probaly screwed here. I don't understand how that could happen in the first place... Has someone else experienced this or mabye has any advice how to resolve this? Any help would be appreciated.

Kind regards Fabian
creator: trefail

title: Instagram not accept cookies, can't log in
content:
i think latest browser update broke instagram. I am stuck accept cookies screen, even i accept these it not disappear. I tried turn off extensions, clear site data, not helped. Works on incgronito mode only?

tried also turn off adblocker stuffs.

works on Chrome atleast fine.

Windows 11 home.

title: YouTube sidebar & comments broken
content: my firefox youtube is broken, every time i close firefox, and open youtube, the comments and the sidabar wont load, until i clear my cookies and login. so that fixes it, but its not permanent. if i close or restart firefox, id have to repeat this process again. and yes, ive disabled all my extentions and cleared cache. and updated firefox.

creator: qgynjz6m6h

title: Lost entire profile!
content:
I'm using 121.0 for Manjaro

Today, I had a problem trying to re-load a website I had saved just the other day. I have a bunch of such websites for a technical project I am working on.

I tried loading the other saved web-sites. All had been saved as a complete file and by this browser. I have no other browser installed.

The problem was that the saved web-page kept re-loading. No forum-discussion could be found so the trouble-shooting option was entered into.

I opened Firefox in safe-mode (via the command-line call). Running a suggestion; clearing cache didn't resolve the problem (in safe-mode the saved web-page still kept re-loading with a rapid cycle)

The next "suggestion" I tried was refresh Firefox. Firefox advised that none of my saved data and settings would be lost. Well, my entire profile is gone!!! Thankfully synchronizing worked such that I could recover passwords, history etc. What are NOT recovered are the settings for websites, probably other infos too.

I have two login-accounts on my system and I have a shared, common profile for both. This was using a public folder with access rights only for those two users.

I have been using that profile architecture for months. This is now gone!! Those folders do not exist anymore. In its place are entirely new folders, their formats completely unfamiliar to me. I am recalling my latest backup but will it be of any use???

Many thanks, indeed.
creator: peter_pollard

title: Can't open or download files properly anymore
content:
I accidentally used wrong disk when downloading a big file. So my primary disk, where I'm running OS became 100% full. Then I removed this big file, checked that disk is not full anymore, and tried to download again, this time choosing the right disk, but now the Firefox internal file browser, where we open files, and select folder to download is broken, pointing wrong location when selecting disk/folders. I tried restarting OS, reinstalling firefox, but it's internal file browser is still broken. In Chrome it's ok, in system file explorer is ok, problem occur only with Firefox. I'm using Pop!_OS 22.04.

Is there a way I can reset this internal file browser to work properly again?
creator: specgamesacc

title: Firefox Closing Immediately Upon Opening Mac
content:
I just installed Firefox 121.0 to start using it on my a MacBook M1 with Monterey 12.6.7, however I am unable to use it at all. When opening Firefox the window disappears instantly, it is just visible for a split second.

After some investigation I noticed that when opening Firefox it instantly tabs to the next application in the Application Switcher (com + Tab) while at the same time all windows disappear. What is weird is that sometimes it does not instantly tab to the next application when firefox is in fullscreen mode, the window also does not disappear when in fullscreen mode.

I have tried a variety of things that I could find on the internet with no improvement such as reinstalling an restarting both Firefox and my MacBook. Since I just installed it fresh there are no plugins installed, no downloads or any user specific settings that are interfering. The about:crashes does not list anything

I did find another question asked almost a year ago with what sounds like the same problem, which does not mention a solution: https://support.mozilla.org/en-US/questions/1395683

Does anyone have an idea of what is causing this problem? and how I can solve this?
creator: bendejong

title: the refresh page option is no longer next to house.  how do I refresh web page now
content: the rotating arrow to refresh the page is no longer located next to the house. How do I refresh the webpage now?

title: Hello, always when want to use the Website "Weather.com" my tab brakes down
content: Always when want to use the Website "Weather.com" my tab brakes down with the announcment" Der Tab ist gerade abgestürzt" which means: the tab just crashed. I do not know why this happens. Does anybody has a suggestion what I can do? I use a MacBook pro from 2015 with OS 12.7.1 and Firefox 120.0.1 Thanks so far Tobias
creator: ludig

title: Firefox automatic updating
content: Ok. The update downloaded 2 1/2 days ago. I've used Firefox since that download. It didn't install until now. 2 1/2 days later. Why the long delay? And why don't you have something show up in the banner or toolbar that designates that an upload to Firefox is happening? Now, we all have to guess why Firefox is behaving slow and erratic, close and re-open, and check for version.
creator: steveaaayyy

title: Restore bookmarks on desktop from already logged-in app?
content: I've been a Firefox user for years on both my (Windows) laptop and (Android) phone. I have recently had to unexpectedly factory reset my laptop and I discovered upon doing so that my Mozilla password in my password keeper isn't up to date - I had to reset my password, and as such I'm currently using "my" Mozilla account with no bookmarks or history available. However, I am still logged into my Firefox account on my phone, with all my history and bookmarks safely saved on there. Is there any way for me to migrate that information back to my desktop app? Verify my desktop account somehow?? I really don't want to lose all my bookmarks, so any info for how to restore that to my desktop account would be very appreciated. Thank you!
creator: tzamozdra

title: Norad Santa Tracker doesn't display properly in Firefox.
content:
Hi. The annual NORAD Santa Tracker website does not function properly under Firefox. While there are no issues with the 3D rendering itself, the 3D map is squished vertically toward the left side of the page. It appears to be defaulting to a mobile browser view. The only extension I have installed is uBlock Origin, and I turned it off for the NORAD Santa website, and the display issue persists.

Opening the site under Safari shows the Santa tracker taking up the entire browser window as it should do.

I'm currently on Mac OS Sonoma using the latest version of Firefox 121.0
creator: wb8979

title: does FF use webview2 ?
content:
Greetings , does FF use webview2 ? I am working on Windows11 with webview2 msEdge and PureBasic . But having difficulty getting proper support . I am building a freeware Kidsafe-Browser , that utilizes a File of Trusted Sites . Everything works great except when I come to youtube.com . For youtube , I would like to capture the URL when on-page-link is clicked . But can't get the support to finish this last step . https://www.purebasic.fr/english

So I am wondering , does FF have something similar to Windows msEdge webview2 that will allow a programmer to interact with Browser progress ?

Thanks for your help...
creator: vmars316
